translations: 单语的；仅用一种语言的；仅懂一种语言的

sentences.sentence: Unlike traditional monolingual programs, bilingual classrooms aim at developing students' ability to use two languages by middle school.
sentences.translation: 与传统的单语课程不同，双语课堂旨在从中学开始培养学生使用两种语言的能力。

sentences.sentence: Considered "bilingual," I made 10% more than my "monolingual" colleagues.
sentences.translation: 由于通晓“双语”，我比我的“单语”同事们多赚10%。
